original: intros. intros HF Himp Hdiff. unfold filterdiff in Hdiff. destruct Hdiff as [Hlin Hdom]. split. - unfold is_linear in Hlin. destruct Hlin as [Hlplus Hlscal]. split. + intros x y. rewrite Hlplus. rewrite Hlplus. rewrite Hlscal. rewrite Hlscal. reflexivity. + intros x Hlimx. apply Hdom. apply Hlimx. - intros x Hlimx. apply Himp. apply Hlimx.
